name: getComponentWidth
desc: Sometimes, it’s useful to see the value of a certain state/variable while executing a script for debug purposes. Using the log action, we can send output to the browser’s console

propSpec.desc: The component’s whose height you need to know

If getScrollWidthis true, you will get the width of the  component including any of the component that is hidden due to overflow. If getScrollWidth is false, you will get the clientWidth which is the visible width of the component.
